com.brianjmelton.apcs.api
Interface PersistenceExceptionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
StubPersistenceExceptionHandler
public interface PersistenceExceptionHandler

This interface specifies callbacks to be implemented by those who wish to provide their own Exception handler

Since:
July 2014

Method Summary

          Called when a cookie persist operation fails.

          Called when a cookie restore operation fails.
